footnote: The link to version 1 has also been removed.

data.value: The name of this site comes from a proposed title of the upcoming Vanessa-Mae's Biography
This site can be viewed at any device that uses a modern web browser. The browser must support technologies such as HTML5, jQuery, Bootstrap and AngularJS.
Images on this site are copyrighted by EMI Records, Sony, and various individuals. I have no connection or contact with Vanessa-Mae or her managers.
Special thanks to Rijko, Daisy and Arioch for providing scans of programs and compact discs. Other images may have originated at The Red Hot Vanessa-Mae Homepage (www.vanessamae.com).
